Producer: Guy de Beaujeu, William Nunez, Christian Parton
Production Co: Metrol Technology, Fluidity Films, North End Pictures, Deya Productions, Parton Pictures, Bohemia Media, Head Gear Films, Lipsync
Synopsis: A married couple allows a stranger to live with them in their idyllic cottage. Will this stranger push their fragile state over the edge?
Title: The Laureate
